  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Away for a day -lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weg für einen Tag - Lektionplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loin pendant un jour - plan de leçon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Afastado por um dia - planta da lição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Via per un giorno - programma di lezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μακριά για μια ημέρα - σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lejos por un día - plan de la lección</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan to ascertain the students ability to give information orally or in writing, and to write emails.Includes assessment rubric</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">email</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan, zum der Kursteilnehmerfähigkeit
zu ermitteln, Informationen im Schreiben mündlich oder zu geben, und 
emails.Includes Einschätzung Rubrik zu schreiben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour s'assurer la capacité 
d'étudiants de fournir l'information oralement ou dans l'écriture, 
et d'écrire la rubrique d'évaluation d'emails.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para verificar a abilidade 
dos estudantes de dar a informação oral ou na escrita, e de escrever
o rubric da avaliação de emails.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per accertare della 
capacità degli allievi di fornire le informazioni oralmente o nella 
scrittura e di scrivere la rubrica di valutazione di emails.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για να εξακριβώσει τη δυνατότητα
σπουδαστών να δώσουν τις πληροφορίες προφορικά ή γράφοντας 
εγγράφως, και να γράψουν τα ηλεκτρονικά ταχυδρομεία περιλαμβάνει 
τη ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para comprobar la 
capacidad de los estudiantes de dar la información oral o en la 
escritura, y de escribir la rúbrica del gravamen de emails.Includes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">email</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">email</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
